version_description:
[New achievements] We added a new PRO level! Earn it and get a unique golden frame for your profile.
[Improved] Improve your options by using our new feature to filter the age range and distance to discover new people around you. We have overlooked to put this feature for women but now, it is already available for both genders.
[UI Improved] User profile improvements for the users of Arabic language.

[Improved] You can now see your visitors on My Profile Section.
[New features] Finally, you can see who likes you on Messenger Section.
[Fixed] You cannot change your main profile picture previously.
[Localization] Localized more strings in French, Arabic, German, Russian, Thai, Korean, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Italian, Japanese and Swedish languages.

[New features] Video-calls are now supported.
[Improved] Cards Section shows more relevant users.
[Localizations] Push-notifications for Thai language was translated.
[Localizations] New translation inputs for Arabic, Swedish, Thai and Russian languages.
[Localizations] Indonesian language is now available.

[New features] Introducing video-invitations. Face-to-face virtual communication now makes conversations better!
[Less crashes] Crash fixed for some users on the Video Date screens.
[Localizations] New translation inputs for Japanese and Russian languages.
[iPad] Fixes on squashed blocks on the My Profile Section for better user experience.
[iPhone SE] Fixes on squashed blocks for better screen experience.

[Less crashes] Crash fixed for some users on the Video Date screens.
[Improved] Achievement Section is no longer as recurring as before.
[Improved] Some deeplinks do not open properly before, but now it's working fine.
[Localization] Localized more strings in French, Arabic, German, Russian, Thai, Korean, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Italian, Japanese and Swedish languages.

[New features] Make your move by giving your crush something special. Introducing virtual gifts. Choose from a variety of sweet and thoughtful gifts to brighten up their day.
[Localization] Localized more strings in Arabic, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish and Ukrainian languages.
[Less crashes] Crash fixed for some users on the Launch screen. Worry less for an awesome dating experience.
[iPhone X] Fixes on squashed blocks for better screen experience. Enjoy dating without the stress.

[Improved] NEW UPGRADES ON VIRTUAL GIFTS! Make your crush’s day extra special with our new improvements such as animations, push-notification for receivers, new achievements, and displays. Make your crush smile by sending her a special virtual gift. There’s a lot to choose from our variety of gifts so take your pick!
[Improved] We’ve made small improvements for Video Date screens for better user experience.
[iPhone SE Improvements] Fixes on squashed blocks for better screen experience. This upgrade makes your dating experience a breeze.
[Localization] Improves and updates for 16 different languages.

[Improved VideoDate] Make conversations that last! We’ve made small improvements for the VideoDate screens to level up your user experience.
[New Language] Catalan language was added.
[Added] SDK RevenueCat was added

[New Language] Catalan language was added.
[Crashes Fixed] Enhanced user experience as crashes and bugs have been fixed.
[Added] SDK RevenueCat was added.

[iPhone SE] Fixes on squashed blocks for optimized screen experience.
[Improved] Improvements on making Yboo app more native for Arabic language. Easier communication means better connection.
[Analytics] Added new events of the users in Fabric, Firebase, and Adjust. We know you deserve the best experience with the Yboo App so we're continuously improving so that you can enjoy.
[Improved] We made some fixes with the live-photo features so you will no longer experience lags and bugs. Have fun!
